channel.title: fiverr on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in fiverr on Barefoot Rob

item.title: (probably) finished three fiverr orders
item.description: ##21:54 Tuesday 24 February 2015 JST## Just got some nighttime photos of a logo at Shibuya scramble for a guy on Fiverr. He’s got a pretty interesting project, encouraging education through what looks like a fantasy adventure motif. I haven’t looked carefully through the materials, but the website is magicaemathematica.com. Somewhat foolishly, I forgot to charge my phone so it died after the took “10 or 20 photos”. Yeah, I’ve done that before; stress the battery in a sprint and it dies like boom.
